text: Johann Peter Weyer (1859) Portrait with and by Carl Joseph Begas (1813) Wallraf-Richartz Museum St. Gereon in Merheim Johann Peter Joseph Weyer (19 May 1794, Cologne - 25 August 1864, Cologne) was a German architect, most notable as city architect to the city of Cologne. ==External links== *Johann- Peter Weyer: Lithografien und Aquarelle, 1838 * Category:Architects from Cologne Category:19th-century German architects Category:1794 births Category:1864 deaths
title: Johann Peter Weyer
